channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scott Bessent says the World Bank and IMF need a total overhaul: ‘Mission creep has knocked these institutions off course’
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, in remarks to the Institute of International Finance on Wednesday, said the two agencies are falling short.

item.title: Europe: Show you’re serious about Ukraine by tightening sanctions on Russia
item.description: The EU bolsters Putin’s war machine by buying Russian energy, minerals, and metals, even as Russia's economy appears to falter.

item.title: Victims and Eyewitnesses in Kashmir Attack Describe Scenes of Chaos and Horror

item.title: Police Identify 2 Gilgo Beach Victims, a Mother and Her Toddler
item.description: The victims — Tanya Denise Jackson and her daughter, Tatiana Marie Dykes — were found on Long Island, near the area where a serial killer operated.

item.title: Stocks Rally After Trump Administration Comments on Powell, Tariffs and Trade
item.description: Remarks by President Trump and his Treasury secretary fueled a rebound in markets, highlighting how investors are grasping for news about the White Ho...

item.title: Tariffs on China Aren’t Likely to Rescue U.S. Medical Gear Industry
item.description: The few domestic companies that still make protective gear for health care workers have clamored for federal intervention. But they worry President Tr...

item.title: Billionaire Ken Griffin warns that U.S. brand is ‘eroding’
item.description: The Trump administration's tariff policies could impact the country's statute, according to Griffin.

item.title: Scott Bessent Accuses IMF and World Bank of ‘Mission Creep’
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent argued in a speech that the multilateral economic institutions have veered away from their missions.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders start Thursday. Here’s your best chance of getting your hands on one
item.description: Nintendo hasn't raised prices on its new console—yet.

item.title: Elon Musk says Tesla will have ‘thousands’ of Optimus robots by year’s end, but China slapping controls on rare earths is hobbling production
item.description: President Donald Trump’s punitive tariffs provoked Beijing into demonstrating one of its key points of leverage.

item.title: Map: 6.2-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Near Turkey
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: How to Watch Pope Francis’ Funeral
item.description: World leaders and the Catholic faithful from around the globe will attend the funeral on Saturday. Here’s how to watch it and what to expect.
